resources.string: Hello, thank you for updating CometOTP! Here is a list of What\'s New in this version of CometOTP!

1. Introduced a whole new sleek UI update 

 2. Added new account thumbnails • Amazon thumbnail 
 • Degiro thumbnail 
 • Gigabyte Developers thumbnail 
 • Gitea thumbnail 
 • HMRC thumbnail 
 • Humblebundle thumbnail 
 • NAS thumbnail 
 • Rackspace thumbnail 
 • Vultr thumbnail 

 3. Append date and time to backups 

 4. Added setting for different tag behavior 

 5. Introduced Android Sync backup service 

 6. Updated some old account thumbnails 

 7. Major UI fixes 

 8. Minor Bug fixes 

 9. Performance Improvements.
